data.title: James Newton Howard
data.meta_description: What is James Newton Howard up to? Check for news, concerts, tour details, latest info, complete overview for August 2024 on GoOut.
data.text: James Newton Howard (born June 9, 1951) is an American composer, conductor, music producer and musician. He has scored over 100 films and is the recipient of a Grammy Award, Emmy Award, and eight Academy Award nominations. His film scores include Pretty Woman, King Kong , Batman Begins, The Hunger Games series and Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them.
